mdRecord.dcterms:title: Human anti-rho anti-D serum
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Michael Reese Research Foundation [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Empty brown glass bottle, black cap with liquid dispenser attached. Label Information: Anti-Rho. Human Anti-D Serum for slide test. Lot No. 233; 5 cc; Expiration 1960-01-08; Prepared by Michael Reese Research Foundation, Chicago, Illinois; TT. S. License No. 113.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
